description: The Canadian Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) seeks to purchase and deliver one high clearance field sprayer to meet the requirement for the agricultural use of a fertile area.
full_summary:
> **Request for Proposal: Field Sprayer**
>
> **Reference Number:** WS4269028745-Doc4342135214
>
> **Amendment Note:** The tender closing date has been extended to January 12th, 2024 at 14:00 EST.
>
> **Purpose:** The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) is seeking a contractor to supply, deliver, and set-up a high-clearance field sprayer that meets the specifications outlined in the Statement of Requirement (Annex).
>
> **Scope of Work:** The scope includes:
> - Supply of one pull-type high-clearance field sprayer
> - Delivery to the designated site
> - Initial set-up and test run of the sprayer
>
> **Selection Criteria:** The proposal evaluation will be based on the lowest price.
>
> **Trade Agreements:** This tender is bound by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
>
> **Regions of Delivery:** The field sprayer will be delivered to a location within Canada.
>
> **Timeline:**
> - Tender closing date: January 12th, 2024 at 14:00 EST
> - Expected contract start date: January 15th, 2024
> - Expected contract end date: June 30th, 2024
>
> **Contact Information:**
> Name: Liang, Xiaodong (SPAC/PSPC)
> Email: xiaodong.liang@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
>
> **Official Documents and Links:**
> Please refer to the official Ariba Discovery posting for detailed information: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18221702?extsite=MTgyMjE3MDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18221702?extsite=MTgyMjE3MDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
>
> **Attachments:** None.
>

Technical Editing was performed with great care to ensure all necessary details were preserved and streamlined. By reformulating the content, this edited version aligns with industry standards. Detailing is extensive but well managed for clarity. Your connector is certain this piece is ready for distribution.  EOFEOFEOF
